quoteText: Uber does not guarantee that the Services, or any portion thereof, will function on any particular hardware or devices. In addition, the Services may be subject to malfunctions and delays inherent in the use of the Internet and electronic communications.
title: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service

tosdr.case: The service provider makes no warranty regarding uninterrupted, timely, secure or error-free service
tosdr.tldr: [Neutral]  Uber does not guarantee that their Services will work with any particular hardware or devices, and states the disclaimer that their Services may be subject to malfunctions and delays inherent with the use of the Internet and electronic communications.
